items.question: 1. Will I be able to edit my site myself?
items.answer:
Yes, two options are possible:

1. You tell me what you want to change (texts, images...) and I do it for you. It's fast, simple, and without extra fees.

2. I can also develop a custom interface (like a mini CMS), connected to a database. See the "Domain + DB + maintenance" offer.

You choose what suits you best.

items.question: 2. Can I request changes after delivery?
items.answer:
Yes. Small occasional changes (texts, images, colors) are possible free of charge for a few days after delivery.

Beyond that or for bigger changes (extra pages, new sections, features), I offer a quote based on required time.

items.question: 3. Who owns the site after delivery?
items.answer:
Once the site is paid for, it belongs to you: the code, texts, and images are in your name.

If I manage hosting or domain, I remain responsible for technical aspects. The site can be transferred anytime if needed.

items.question: 4. Will the site be mobile-friendly?
items.answer: Yes. All sites I develop are responsive: they adapt automatically to phones, tablets, and desktops.

items.question: 5. Will the site be well visible on Google from launch?
items.answer:
Yes, the site is technically optimized for Google (tags, speed, structure, clear content).

Starting from a good audit and targeted keywords, natural ranking can be excellent even without monthly updates.

items.question: 6. Do you offer SEO follow-up after delivery?
items.answer:
Yes, it‚Äôs possible. In competitive markets, staying well-ranked requires real follow-up: regular content, backlinks, SEO strategy.

I can offer occasional audits or monthly support, depending on your needs and budget.

items.question: 7. What exactly does the base offer include?
items.answer:
It covers essentials: custom design, content writing, development, mobile version, and basic SEO.

It‚Äôs a simple, efficient offer designed for showcase sites. Domain and hosting are optional.

items.question: 8. How long does it take to make a site?
items.answer:
A simple site can be ready in 3 to 10 business days.

But each project is different: complex web apps with specific features may take weeks or months.
